text: The Magic School Bus theme song is getting a make - over for Netflix ’ s revival of the 1990s ’ kids series, thanks to Lin - Manuel Miranda. Lily Tomlin also is set to reprise her role from the original series, which aired on PBS. The Hamilton phenom and multi - Tony winner Miranda is the voice of the classic theme song for The Magic School Bus Rides Again. The song is featured in the new trailer, along with Tomlin ’ s Ms Frizzle ( now Professor Frizzle ) and Kate McKinnon as Fiona Frizzle. Fiona is the younger sister of the famed Professor Frizzle and she has taken over the classroom.
